dct_title_s: Map of the states of Ohio, Indiana and Illinois: with the settled part of Michigan; engraved by J.H. Young.
dct_description_sm: Sold by Mitchell & Hinman...;Falls of Ohio;Includes table of "Steam boat routes."; Vicinity of Detroit;Lead region east of the Mississippi River.; Washington.;Vicinity of Cincinnati;1 map, colored;41 x 51 cm.;ca. 1:2,100,000
